item.description:
This meetup will be cross-posted with Boston Happy Hour. "Come one, come all!" 

Once again, join the Happy Hour group at JOHN HARVARD'S original Brewery. We had a great Meetup there last time, & the time before that also!

http://www.meetup.com/fun-with-alcohol/events/32922072/

John Harvards has 20-oz."beer flights" there which cost the same as ordinary 16 oz. drafts. That means you can sample all the beers they produce there for the price of a draft. They also have pitchers you can share if you prefer.

http://www.johnharvards.com/index.shtml

Note, we now have a table reserved (with stools): ask where the meetup is from the greeting area in front.

"Drinks only" is fine but appetizer specials are available.
item.how_to_find_us: We have a table with stools reserved, so ask where we are at the reception area. I will wear a cowboy hat.
item.name: John Harvard's Beer Tasting
